0x90A9E0B2.name: OVERRIDE_PEDS_CAN_STAND_ON_TOP_FLAG

params.name: flag
params.description: true to override, false to use default game behavior.

0x90A9E0B2.description:
Sets whether peds can stand on top of *all* vehicles without falling off.

Note this flag is not replicated automatically, you will have to manually do so.
